name: Alien Invaders
description: Alien Invaders brings you the possibilitie of reviving one of the best and most old videogame experiences in the history, play as a pilot of space shit to defeat the aliens. Play alone or with friends as local coop. And it also prepares you to fight against the aliens instead of crying scared, you can read more about this inside.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Supported Storage: 50 MB available space
